title: Pangram for peaceful meditation
content:
One of those P-26 or T-22 places had a pangram contest and this was someone’s remarkable entry. For your bedtime pleasure…

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/f-rottoncrop.jpg)
author: fontplayer

comments.content:
wow, that’s scary!!!

(i mean the font - what is it, it’s terrible???)
From the name, my guess it was meant to be terrible. It’s called F-Rotten by Guido Piccione

Kinda’ soothing text to bring happy thoughts. My guess is that the Dali Llama did NOT write it :-)

ChrisL
